version_description:
NEW in the update:
1) Was added a high-quality voice acting in following languages:
Germany, Spanish, Turkish
2) Was qualitatively improved voice acting in English language
3) The gameplay and understandability of games for the youngest children were qualitatively improved. The system of prompts in games was improved as well.

NEW in the update:
1) Was added a high-quality voice acting in following languages:
Germany, Spanish, Turkish
2) Was qualitatively improved voice acting in English language
3) The gameplay and understandability of games for the youngest children were qualitatively improved. The system of prompts in games was improved as well.
New icon
New icon
Some minor issues was resolved.
Some minor issues was resolved.

The most terrifying and spooky holiday knocks at your door!
Let’s Celebrate Halloween! Your favorite Funny Foods have become even tastier!
To shoot pumpkins into monstrous food, cook it in a magic cauldron, fly on a broomstick and catch bats ... — all of these things you will find in a new festive update of FUNNY FOODS app.
====================
Dear moms and dads, please tell your friends about us and leave feedback. Your opinion is very important for us. We will gladly consider all your suggestions!
====================
A HUGE update is coming!

Playing with Funny Food is even more interesting!
New visual features have been added. It will make the learning process more effective and more gripping. New dynamic game will not only entertain the child, but also will help to develop attention, visual memory, fine motor skills and reaсtion.
